item.title: Product Promotion Photographer/Videographer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented photographer/videographer to promote our product through visually captivating pictures and videos. This is a part-time job opportunity with flexible hours. As a photographer/videographer, your primary responsibility will be to create high-quality visual content that showcases the features and benefits of our product. The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for detail, excellent composition skills, and the ability to work with both natural and artificial lighting. Experience in product photography/videography and proficiency in photo/video editing software are required. Attention to branding guidelines and the ability to work independently are essential. Join us in creating stunning visuals that will drive customer engagement and increase awareness of our product!

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 26, 2024 10:10 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Video Production, Photography, Video Editing, Videography
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Video Production, Photography, Video Editing, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Conference Video Editor TODAY (Wed 26th July) - Upwork
item.description:
We are filming a CEO talk to his staff today.
11am - 12pm UK Time

After that's done I will upload the footage to Dropbox.

It's a 2-camera shoot.

1x Tripod close up
1x Gimbal moving

Multicam edit.

Only thing is... it needs to be edited straight away and delivered this afternoon.

Client wants to have a CEO Piece to Camera at the beginning.
Then, highlights of his talk including.

He may well say exactly which parts need including.

Currently we're aiming for a 4 minute video.

Process would be to sync the clips to Multicam.
Then, edit as required.

Please ONLY apply if you're available this afternoon and can start work as soon as it's uploaded.

Hourly Range: $18.00-$32.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 09:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editing assistant to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a basic level of video editing experience and a strong attention to detail. As a video editing assistant, you will be responsible for assisting our lead video editor in editing and assembling raw footage into a finished product. This includes organizing and labeling files, adding basic transitions and effects, and ensuring the video meets our quality standards. The ability to work efficiently and meet deadlines is crucial. If you have a passion for video editing and are eager to learn and grow in this field, we would love to hear from you.

Skills needed:
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
- Basic understanding of video editing techniques
- Strong attention to detail
- Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
- Excellent organization and time management skills

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 26, 2024 09:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Photo Slideshow, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Photo Slideshow, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Static Image Video Editing with Dialogue Bubbles and Effects - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor to create a short video based on a static image, incorporating various visual effects and dialogue bubbles.

The final product should effectively convey the provided script, emphasizing the emotions and dialogue of the characters depicted in the image. The video will be silent, focusing solely on visual storytelling.

Materials Provided:
Image is attached:

Script:
- Zoom in on the boy sitting in the row closest to the windows and the board.
- Dialogue bubble: "I failed again."
- Transition to the girl sitting in the row farthest from the windows and the board.
- Dialogue bubble: "I'm tired of studying."
Zoom out.
- Dialogue bubbles rise from the other children: "I'm tired too", "I don't understand", "I have no energy", "Boring", "Ugh", "Ugh", "Ugh".
- Effects: The teacher catches fire or explodes.
- Dialogue bubbles from the teacher: "I've tried everything", "Why am I always blamed", "Corona, war", "I'm tired too".
-Zoom in on the board.
-pause
-Zoom out.
-End with a happy image effect (e.g., balloons rising, fireworks, or any celebratory effect).

Requirements:
Proven experience in video editing and creating visual effects.
Ability to deliver high-quality work within a tight deadline.
Portfolio showcasing similar projects (if available).

Application Instructions:
Please submit your resume and relevant portfolio samples.
Provide an estimated timeline for project completion.

Additional Notes:
This project does not include any sound editing; all effects are visual only.
Creativity in implementing the visual effects and dialogue bubbles to enhance the storytelling is highly appreciated.
Preference will be given to those who work with Fillmore and can provide a file of the project suitable for Fillmore 12


Budget: $20
Posted On: June 26, 2024 09:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Wondershare Filmora, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Production, 2D Animation
Skills: Wondershare Filmora, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Production, 2D Animation
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.title: Video editor needed for TikTok/YouTube short videos of people appealing for help in Gaza - Upwork
item.description:
Hello Everyone

GetMoreDonations is a performance based agency based in Boca Raton Florida that specializes in helping out non profit organizations with fundraising for charities. Our goal is to help as many people as possible that are in dire need of our help.

Just to give you an idea, we have helped tens of thousands of families in places such as Yemen, Syria, and even assisted the homeless in NYC.

We are looking for a solid video editor that can help us make emotional stories by editing found-footage and news clips.

Here is an example of a video we found:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OSdddzjkzpM

This is how the video should be edited after (Here is an example of how we edited it):

https://youtu.be/ceRU9EMknsU

Basically when you edit these videos they need to show the most emotional part of the refugees story and then get people to donate as quickly as possible.

You must have experience editing videos. Facebook and Youtube ads experience a big plus. You must be competent and able to retell emotional stories by editing found-footage and news clips. You must speak good/fluent english for proper communication, know terms such as "L Cut" , and be able to complete projects within specified deadlines.  When applying please send examples of what videos you have edited in the past.

If you meet our requirements, then this will be for a full time, long term position.  With your help, we can help expand our goal to help 1,000,000 people in less than a year.

To learn more about us, please visit getmoredonations.com

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 09:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:

item.title: UGC Creators Needed for Natural Skincare Brand - Upwork
item.description:
Hello UGC Creators! 🌟

We are a new natural skincare brand called NOOMI Stockholm, looking for women 50+ to create engaging UGC content that we will use on our social media platforms.

We will provide partial scripts and guidelines but welcome your own creativity and experience in creating a video that resonates well with our audience. A brief will be sent out prior, along with examples of the style of content we are looking for. We will also be sending out products to be included in the video.

Budget: $100 + Free skincare products (worth between $120-$165)

Please note that you need to be based in the US, Australia, or Canada and be at least 45 years old.

Looking forward to working with you and creating beautiful content!



Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 09:27 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:UGC, Testimonial Video, Product Video, Video Commercial, Video Advertising, Instagram Reels, Content Creation, Content Editing, Video Camera, Social Media Video
Skills: UGC, Testimonial Video, Product Video, Video Commercial, Video Advertising, Instagram Reels, Content Creation, Content Editing, Video Camera, Social Media Video

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to join our team and assist in editing our YouTube videos. The videos we upload are typically 6-7 minutes long and require cutting and trimming to ensure engaging and concise content. As a video editor, you will need to have a keen eye for detail and a strong sense of storytelling. Your responsibilities will include reviewing raw footage, selecting the best clips, arranging the content in a logical sequence, adding transitions, and enhancing the overall video quality. The ideal candidate should be proficient in video editing software and have experience editing content for YouTube.   

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Attention to detail
- Storytelling
- Time management


Posted On: June 26, 2024 09:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Germany

item.title: French Speaking Short From Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled French-speaking short form editor to support us on a project for one of our clients.

I run a leading influencer marketing agency based in the UK focusing on gaming, tech and entertainment clients.

We have an exciting project for a mobile gaming client in which we need to create a number of short form videos in French.

How the project works is we currently gift mobile phone controllers to influencers who create and make content for our use.

We would then need a talented French-speaking short form editor to make edits to the content the influencers provide. These assets will then be used on Instagram reels, stories, tiktoks and facebook

You would have to do editing work such as:

- Adding on screen text
- Transitions
- Effects
- Cutting and Splicing
- Editing different pieces of content together
- and more

This will not be a massive amount of work and we are looking to work on a pay per edit basis and likelihood is you would have a maximum of 5-7 simple edits per month for the following 6 months.

Should this go well, we would look to onboard you for more projects with French clients or English speaking clients.

Please apply if this is you and attach your portfolio of short form edits and also your rate per edit.

To progress to an interview for this role we would be looking for you to create a sample edit for us using footage that we provide so we can verify the quality of your work.


Posted On: June 26, 2024 09:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:TikTok Video, Short Video Ad, YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, Video Editing, French, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: TikTok Video, Short Video Ad, YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, Video Editing, French, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

We have an exciting project for a mobile gaming client in which we need to create a number of short form videos in Italian.

How the project works is we currently gift mobile phone controllers to influencers who create and make content for our use.

We would then need a talented Italian-speaking short form editor to make edits to the content the influencers provide. These assets will then be used on Instagram reels, stories, tiktoks and Facebook.

You would have to do editing work such as:

- Adding on screen text
- Transitions
- Effects
- Cutting and Splicing
- Editing different pieces of content together
- and more

This will not be a massive amount of work and we are looking to work on a pay per edit basis and likelihood is you would have a maximum of 5-7 simple edits per month for the following 6 months.

Should this go well, we would look to onboard you for more projects with Italian clients or English speaking clients.

Please apply if this is you and attach your portfolio of short form edits and also your rate per edit.

To progress to an interview for this role we would be looking for you to create a sample edit for us using footage that we provide so we can verify the quality of your work.


Posted On: June 26, 2024 09:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Short Video Ad, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Italian, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
